Package weka.classifiers.trees.ht

Class NBNodeAdaptive

java.lang.Object
weka.classifiers.trees.ht.HNode

weka.classifiers.trees.ht.NBNode
weka.classifiers.trees.ht.NBNodeAdaptive
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, LearningNode
public class NBNodeAdaptive extends NBNode implements LearningNode, Serializable
Implements a LearningNode that chooses between using majority class or naive Bayes for prediction
Version:
$Revision: 9705 $
Author:
Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz), Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
